resources.string: This app enables adaptive refresh on unsupported Samsung Galaxy devices. You must grant WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS permission using ADB to use it.
Automatically switches Galaxy device based on interaction.

Adaptive Hz automatically switches your display refresh rate between based on your touch and usage. To enable this feature, you need to activate the accessibility service. After enabling the “Adaptive Hz” service, you can return to the app.
Could not open accessibility settings. Please enable it manually from Settings > Accessibility.
